alert.note: Alert for Dakota; Goodhue; Rice (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 3:30PM CDT until July 24 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL DAKOTA...WEST CENTRAL GOODHUE AND EAST CENTRAL RICE COUNTIES... At 330 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Stanton, or 8 miles northeast of Northfield, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Cannon Falls around 335 PM CDT. Stanton around 340 PM CDT. Nerstrand around 400 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Wastedo, Hader, Lake Byllesby, Randolph, Nerstrand Big Woods State Park and Hampton. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure.
